minions.name: Goblin
minions.description: Almost useless, but can at least clean the floor and mine some gold.

minions.name: Skeleton
minions.description: Basic undead creatures. Slightly stronger than goblins, but still not enough to win a war.

minions.name: Zombie
minions.description: Slow but tough undead. Can take more damage than a skeleton, but is very stupid.

minions.name: Orc
minions.description: Stronger and more aggressive, is a mediocre melee fighter.

minions.name: Wolf
minions.description: Fast and agile. Good for quick attacks and harass. Can also serve as mount for small units

minions.name: Hobgoblin
minions.description: More disciplined and stronger than regular goblins. Will at least scare the squires.

minions.name: Ghoul
minions.description: Undead creatures that can paralyze with their touch. They have a cold aura that I don't dislike.

minions.name: Ogre
minions.description: Large and very strong ~. Can deal and take a lot of damage.

minions.name: Troll
minions.description: Strong regenerative abilities. They are tough opponents

minions.name: Wraith
minions.description: Ghostly beings that can drain life force. It's like me, but worse.

minions.name: Dark Elf
minions.description: Skilled in both magic and combat. Agile and dangerous.

minions.name: Minotaur
minions.description: Powerful creatures with great strength and endurance. They have so much stamina ~

minions.name: Vampire
minions.description: Undead with high intelligence and various abilities, including life drain and transformation.

minions.name: Werewolf
minions.description: Shape-shifters with enhanced strength, speed, and senses. They're like wolves.. But better ~

minions.name: Liche
minions.description: Powerful undead sorcerers. Command over dark magic and hordes of small minions.

minions.name: Elemental
minions.description: Beings of pure elemental energy. Very powerful and difficult to control. The only thing they hate more than us is the humans.

minions.name: Wyvern
minions.description: Smaller dragon-like creatures. Can fly and breathe fire or poison.

minions.name: Giant Spider
minions.description: The size of a house, they are poisonous and can trap enemies with webs.

minions.name: Chimera
minions.description: Multi-headed beasts with various abilities. They can have the best of each minion.

minions.name: Gargoyle
minions.description: Stone-like creatures that can turn to stone and are tough to defeat. Did I mention that they are the size of a Giant Spider ?

minions.name: Hellhound
minions.description: Fiery dogs from the underworld. Fast, deadly, and extremely hot. Strangely likes hugs.

minions.name: Basilisk
minions.description: Serpentine creatures with a petrifying gaze. Strangely scared of hugs.

minions.name: Manticore
minions.description: Beasts with the body of a lion, a human face, and a scorpion tail. For some reason they really scare humans.

minions.name: Hydra
minions.description: Multi-headed serpents. When one head is cut off, two more grow back. I once saw one with a thousand heads.

minions.name: Dragon
minions.description: Multi-headed serpents. When one head is cut off, two more grow back. I once saw one with a thousand heads.

minions.name: Behemoth
minions.description: Massive creatures with incredible strength and durability. It's always though to fight against mountains.

minions.name: Demon
minions.description: High-ranking infernal beings with immense power and various magical abilities. There can fight against mountains.

minions.name: Archdemon
minions.description: Among the most powerful infernal beings. Command vast dark powers and legions of lesser demons. Second only to you.
